dcterms:creator: N. Srivastava
E. Mansimov
R. Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: The Moving MNIST dataset consists of 10,000 video sequences of two randomly selected moving digits sampled from the original MNIST dataset. Each sequence is 20 frames long, with a frame size of 64x64 grayscale pixels.
dcterms:title: Moving MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a collection of real-life traffic videos captured by a roof-mounted camera on a car driving in an urban environment. It includes various categories of recorded sessions for training and validation.
dcterms:title: KITTI
